Uses of Interface
xml.Saveable

Packages that use Saveable
nodes   
transmissions   
turns   
 

Uses of Saveable in nodes
 

Classes in nodes that implement Saveable
 class Location
          A (2D) location in the field.
 class Sensor
          This is the Sensor class.
 

Uses of Saveable in transmissions
 

Classes in transmissions that implement Saveable
 class Data
          This class is responsible for all the data in transmissions.
 class NetworkData
          This class is responsible for informations about the network.
 class Protocol
          The protocol class handles transmitting and receiving transmissions.
 class Transmission
          A transmissions can be sent between two transmitters and may contain data.
 

Uses of Saveable in turns
 

Classes in turns that implement Saveable
 class Turn
          Turn contains data about each turn (between every step).
static class Turn.RunnableTurn
          This handles iterating through the list of sensors in their turn-based order and then allowing them to execute their phases.
 class TurnController
          TurnController is class to handle Turn advancements conviently.
private static class TurnController.TurnControllerImplementation
          This class implements TurnController.
